nodes.description: 一周前，伊拉克军队宣布费卢杰被完全解放，削弱了伊斯兰国在安巴尔省的据点
nodes.support_text: The attacks came just a little over a week after Iraqi forces declared Fallujah 'fully liberated', marking a major victory against IS.

nodes.description: 午夜，伊斯兰国宣称负责的卡车炸弹袭击在巴格达市中心发生，造成115人死亡、187人受伤
nodes.support_text: A suicide truck bomb in downtown Baghdad killed 115 people and wounded nearly 200 others... The attack, claimed by the Islamic State group, was the deadliest in months...

nodes.description: 同一天稍后，巴格达Shaab社区发生路边炸弹袭击，导致5人死亡、16人受伤，未明确宣称责任
nodes.support_text: Elsewhere in Baghdad, a roadside bomb went off in the mostly Shiite Shaab neighborhood, killing five people and wounding 16...

nodes.description: 袭击后，伊拉克总理和议员访问爆炸现场
nodes.support_text: Hours after the Baghdad bombing, Iraqi Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi and lawmakers visited the blast site.

nodes.description: 同一天，愤怒的群众抗议总理，向其车队投掷物品
nodes.support_text: Eyewitnesses said the crowd pelted al-Abadi's car with rocks, shoes and jerry cans.

nodes.description: 联合国和白宫谴责袭击，呼吁加强安全措施
nodes.support_text: The U.N. envoy... described the Karada attack as 'a cowardly and heinous act of unparalleled proportions'... The White House also condemned the bombings.

nodes.description: 袭击后，政府部队收复摩苏尔周边七个村庄，以切断补给线
nodes.support_text: government forces retook seven villages south of the IS-held city of Mosul as part of a small-scale operation started in March...

edges.support_text: The attacks came just a little over a week after Iraqi forces declared Fallujah 'fully liberated', marking a major victory against IS.
Elsewhere in Baghdad, a roadside bomb went off in the mostly Shiite Shaab neighborhood...
Hours after the Baghdad bombing, Iraqi Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi and lawmakers visited the blast site.
Eyewitnesses said the crowd pelted al-Abadi's car with rocks, shoes and jerry cans.
The U.N. envoy... described the Karada attack as 'a cowardly and heinous act of unparalleled proportions'...
government forces retook seven villages south of the IS-held city of Mosul as part of a small-scale operation started in March...
卡车炸弹袭击后发生烧伤事件
卡车炸弹袭击后发生窒息事件
伊斯兰国宣称负责的卡车炸弹袭击在巴格达市中心发生
视频片段被上传至社交媒体发生在卡车炸弹袭击后
人群称al-Abadi为‘小偷’发生在卡车炸弹袭击后
人群朝总理车队喊叫发生在卡车炸弹袭击后
极端分子攻占费卢杰后，伊斯兰国宣称负责的卡车炸弹袭击在巴格达市中心发生
人们认为费卢杰是袭击的策源地后，伊斯兰国宣称负责的卡车炸弹袭击在巴格达市中心发生
烧伤事件后警方发布声明
伊斯兰国声明爆炸目标后实施针对什叶派穆斯林的袭击
医疗官员确认伤亡数字后，所有官员发言
